testcase.name: Verify that api is returning correct response for given postId
testcase.system-out: * url 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/' ............................. passed * def expectedOutput = read('ResponseJson/responseGet.json') .............. passed Given path 'comments' ..................................................... passed And param postId = 1 ...................................................... passed When method Get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And assert response.length == 5 ........................................... passed And match response == expectedOutput ...................................... passed And match responseHeaders['Content-Type'][0] == 'application/json; charset=utf-8' . passed

testcase.name: Verify that api is empty response body on giving wrong postId
testcase.system-out: * url 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/' ............................. passed * def expectedOutput = read('ResponseJson/responseGet.json') .............. passed Given path 'comments' ..................................................... passed And param postId = 1 ...................................................... passed When method Get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And assert response.length == 5 ........................................... passed And match response == expectedOutput ...................................... passed And match responseHeaders['Content-Type'][0] == 'application/json; charset=utf-8' . passed * url 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/' ............................. passed * def expectedOutput = read('ResponseJson/responseGet.json') .............. passed Given path 'comments' ..................................................... passed And param postId = 'a' .................................................... passed When method Get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == [] .................................................. passed

testcase.name: Verify that api returning 404 on using wrong url
